prTitle: feat: implement election management interface for PTA voting admin panel
prBody:
## Summary

Implements the election management interface (issue #120) with full CRUD operations for election configuration and status management.

### Features Implemented

**Admin API Endpoints:**
- `GET /api/voting/admin/election` - Get current election configuration
- `PUT /api/voting/admin/election/status` - Update election status (SETUP/ACTIVE/CLOSED)
- `POST /api/voting/admin/election/positions` - Add new position to election
- `DELETE /api/voting/admin/election/positions/<position>` - Remove position from election
- `require_admin_session()` helper for authentication validation

**Admin Dashboard UI:**
- `Dashboard.jsx` - Main admin interface with tab navigation
- `ElectionManagement.jsx` - Full election management component
- Admin route handling in `App.jsx` for `/voting/admin`

**Election Management Features:**
- Real-time election status display with color-coded indicators
- Status transition buttons (SETUP → ACTIVE → CLOSED) with API integration
- Position configuration form (add/remove positions)
- Automatic timestamp management for election start/end times
- Auto-refresh functionality (30-second intervals)
- Comprehensive error handling and validation
- Responsive design with Tailwind CSS
- React hooks best practices with proper dependency management

### Acceptance Criteria Met

✅ **Position configuration form functional (add/edit positions)**
- Add position form with input validation and Enter key support
- Remove position functionality with confirmation dialogs
- Real-time position list updates with proper state management

✅ **Status toggle buttons update election state via API**
- Three status buttons: Setup, Activate, Close with proper disabled states
- API integration with comprehensive error handling
- Automatic timestamp management (start_time on ACTIVE, end_time on CLOSED)

✅ **Current election status displayed and updates in real-time**
- Color-coded status badges (yellow for SETUP, green for ACTIVE, gray for CLOSED)
- Auto-refresh every 30 seconds with manual refresh option
- Election details display (name, description, creation date, start/end times)

✅ **Form validation and error handling implemented**
- Input validation for empty position names
- API error display with user-friendly messages and dismissible alerts
- Loading states during API calls (separate states for different operations)
- Confirmation dialogs for destructive actions (position removal)

### Technical Implementation

**Backend (Flask):**
- Admin authentication middleware with proper session validation
- Election data management via VotingDataStore with thread-safe operations
- RESTful API design with proper HTTP status codes and error messages
- Position management with add/remove operations

**Frontend (React):**
- React hooks for state management (useState, useEffect, useCallback)
- AuthContext integration for admin authentication
- Fetch API for backend communication with proper error handling
- Real-time UI updates with auto-refresh functionality
- Responsive design with Tailwind CSS styling
- ESLint compliant code following React best practices

### Code Quality

- ✅ Frontend builds successfully with no errors
- ✅ ESLint compliance for all new components
- ✅ Proper React hooks usage with correct dependency arrays
- ✅ TypeScript-ready component structure
- ✅ Responsive design with mobile-friendly interface
- ✅ Comprehensive error handling and loading states

### Testing

- Manual verification of all API endpoints
- Component structure validation
- Error handling scenarios tested
- Admin authentication flow verified
- Build process validated
- Linting compliance confirmed

Closes #120
